dct_title_s: Johnson's new map of the state of Texas
dct_alternative_sm: Johnson's new map of the state of Texas / by Johnson & Browning.
dct_description_sm: Insets: Plan of Sabine Lake -- Plan of the northern part of Texas -- Plan of Galveston Bay.
Nos. 39-40 in Johnson, A.J. Johnson's new illustrated (steel plate) family atlas... comp., drawn and engraved under the supervision of J.H. Colton and A.J. Johnson. 1861.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
